name: j-sql
description: transform js object or json to sql select or update

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R dot -t 20 test/*.js
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot -t 20 test/*.js

author: haoxin
